long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Penknife chrome extension connects you to the Penknife tool in Google Chrome.

By using Penknife's chrome extension, one can do the below:
- Identify if a particular LinkedIn profile /DiscoverOrg record exists in Penknife records
-  Add a LinkedIn profile/Discoverorg record to any entity in Penknife without actually opening Penknife
- Automatically converts the LinkedIn profile like a resume and save it under file for a particular candidate.

Penknife chrome extension makes it super easy to engage with Penknife while browsing LinkedIn & Discoverorg. The interaction is seamless.

To know more about Penknife, read below:

Penknife is an ATS + CRM SAAS tool that helps temporary staffing agencies manage the entire recruitment cycle. The application tracking system of Penknife helps recruiters source candidates, track recruitment lifecycle and monitor overall performance. On the other hand, the CRM system allows sales & account managers to help keep a tap on the sales funnel. Recruiters use LinkedIn to source the majority of the candidates, whereas Sales use DiscoverOrg to source potential clients.

Our chrome extension helps both recruiters & sales personnel to add records easily. Thereby saving a lot of their time.
